sections.title: Tools That Make Managing Money Easier
sections.subtitle: Apps, methods, and systems that help you stay on track

sections.title: What You'll Learn
items: Popular budgeting apps and how to choose one

sections.title: Categories of Tools
sections.content: The best tool is the one you'll use consistently. Explore apps for budgeting, savings automation, investment tracking, and bill reminders.

points.title: Simplicity
points.description: Choose a tool with a clean interface you enjoy using.

points.title: Automation
points.description: Look for auto-categorization, savings rules, and recurring transfers.

points.title: Security
points.description: Use tools with strong encryption and two-factor authentication.

sections.title: Start Small
sections.content: Track spending in one category this week (e.g., dining out). Expand gradually.

sections.title: Pro Tip
sections.content: If you prefer spreadsheets, start with a simple template and add complexity only when needed.
